articles.author: Scott Streater
articles.title: Interior cancels largest solar project in North America - Politico
articles.description: It's the Trump administration's latest move to slow or block major clean energy projects.
articles.content:
The administration wants to stop these projects, period, so there is no chance for approval, he said.
